entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
